name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The campus police at Beijing Normal University Zhuhai Campus have started patrolling for "strange costumes".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Foxconn 2.0 incident, Teacher Li’s tweets summary
Next, we will gradually integrate past tweets in the form of a timeline on the website.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Due to Twitter's mechanism, tweets exceeding a certain number cannot be displayed on the homepage. Therefore, netizens often ask me how to see previous tweets, and some even suspect that I have deleted previous tweets.
I hope that this method can leave a way for Twitter friends who want to review and scholars who want to verify. At the same time, I also hope that the use of the website model can alleviate the current embarrassing situation of not being able to make a profit for a long time. …
